title: Did the German Government Use a Soap Opera to ‘Brainwash’ Children to Become Muslim?
subtitle: Right-wing web sites grossly misrepresented the significance and meaning of one scene from one 2006 episode.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A scene from a 2006 episode of the soap opera 'Lindenstrasse' is evidence of a German government effort to convince Germans to accept Muslims or become Muslim.
